title: Wonderful 770 sqft, 1 bed, 1 bath floorplan at East Perimeter Pointe Apartments
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Leasing Office:', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what East Perimeter Pointe Apartments has to offer!', 'Get ready for a refreshing new take on apartment living, at East Perimeter Pointe.', 'These newly renovated apartments in Decatur, GA offer the pinnacle of comfort, convenience, and style, with spacious and streamlined 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans, top-notch amenities and a wonderful location just 20 minutes east of downtown Atlanta along I-20.', 'Each of our dynamic and inviting apartment homes is smartly appointed with upgraded lighting packages, sunrooms, and custom paint tones, all of which work together to create a homey and inspiring environment.', 'Our amenities list is the envy of Decatur, featuring both indoor and outdoor pools, lighted tennis courts, and a cardio and fitness center, among many other enticing attractions.', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Contact our dedicated management team today to set up your private tour and let us welcome you to the East Perimeter Pointe family!', 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / 770 - 889 sq ft / $1188/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Cozy Fireplaces', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Island Kitchens', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Storage Units', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '◾ Hardwood Flooring', '◾ Newly Renovated Apartments', '◾ Patio or Balcony Options', '◾ Roommate Floor Plans', '◾ Townhomes Available', '◾ Upgraded Lighting Package', '◾ Washer & Dryer Connections', 'Additional Information:', '◾ Accepts Electronic Payments', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Fax/Copy Services', '◾ Gated Access', '◾ Indoor Pool', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Electronic Rent Payment', '◾ Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '◾ Monthly Resident Events', '◾ On-site Maintenance Management', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Racquetball Court(s)', '◾ Resident Referral Bonuses', '◾ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C12E7C9B78AD474E']
